column2: "The Six have successfully woven the barrier. [Profound Darkness] should be confined to this area."
"<%me>. It is requiring our full strength to maintain this barrier."
"That means the spotlight's all yours, kid. This thing is a real workout."
"Don't forget we Three Heroes fought off Dark Falz... well, copies... but who's keeping track?"
"...Hey, peon!! I still have a lot to discuss with my predecessor!"
"If you don't do your job... you'll answer to me!!"
"Ditto. I have so much to tell big sis."
"You bring her back, no matter what. Don't return without her."
"If you mess this up... you'll answer to me, too!"
"Hahaha!! Your weary voice is hardly convincing!"
"<%me>!! I have little more to say!! Remember, anything is possible!! Just do it!!"
"We've got your back whatever happens, so relax. Don't hesitate."
"Never forget that we're in this together, <%me>."
"1. Matoi, I'm here to save you."
"2. Matoi, it's time to go home."
